price: 103. Op fluisterende wijze spreken zij elkaar aan: “Jullie hebben niet langer dan tien (dagen) doorgebracht (op aarde).”
arabic: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yatakhāfatūna baynahum in labith'tum illā ʿashran
